item.description:
Every time I walk by this place the aroma is so so intense.

Not just for brunch but for for lunch and dinner also.

Since we have not done a early dinner Meet-up and I have ask Tonya in regards to dinner ,she said yes,

Well here it is....

Dinner at Alfresco...

For the mature crowd with a unique palate..

Our reservation will be at 6 :30 pm. If you arrive late, ask for Jo-Ann Reservation at the door.

Sorry about the two times I had on the description and place.
Thanks for understanding see everyone there..

This restaurant is located in Davis Square Somerville. Parking is free on Sunday.

Do not Park in the Rite Aid Parking Lot you will be towed even on Sunday (Be Advise).

Their menu consist of Fresh Antipasto , Vegetarian Plates such as Ravioli Pomodoro, Porcini Ravioli and Gnocchii to name a few.

Entrees consist of Shrimp Risotto, Grilled Salmon, Shrimp or Scallops Linguine, Pan Seared Chicken, Chicken Carciofi wow can I say more...

Meat - Tortellini with Prosciutto, Veal Parmesan, Veal Alfresco, Veal Marcela, oh my..

Desert - New York Style Cheesecake, Carrot Cake to name a few.

This restaurant is quaint and relaxing day or night.

Prices range from $8.95 to $15.95.

Sorry at this time they do not have a website.

If you need more information on their menu let me know will send it to you.

Would love to get together before the New Year, let's enjoy, talk, mingle whatever...
2008 is around the bend...

Let's enjoy each others company, conversation....

This location is accessible by the MBTA Red Line to Davis Square T Stop.
For more information go to MBTA.org

By car go to Mapquest.

Please bring cash only to pay for menu and 20 % tip plus tax on all meals.

If there is a waiting list let me know that you are interested and I will see what I can do - thanks

MEMBER GUIDELINES

Our focus is on a friendly and respectful gathering while sharing a fantastic meal with one another.

Please be considerate of your fellow dining companions time by arriving on time.

Please bring enough cash to pay for your meal, drinks, and tip including tax.

Please RSVP YES Only if your are certain you will be attending.

If your name appears on the event page as a YES after the event and you have not attended the event, it is counted as a NO-Show.

If you change your RSVP from a YES to a NO in less than 24 Hours of the event you are counted as a NO-Show.

If any guests you have RSVPd for NO-Show it will count as if you have NO-Showed.

If you NO-Show fir three events you are removed from the group.

group.name: Breakfast, Brunch, Lunch, & Dinner Meetup Group

item.name: First Time Dinner In Davis Square
